We are excited to announce that Lizel Potgieter from SLUBI has been nominated for the Supervisor of the Year 2025 award by the ASK/LTV PhD Student Council. This nomination is a wonderful recognition of Lizel's dedication to supporting students and reflects the appreciation her students have for her guidance and support. 

All nominees will be recognised at the upcoming Award for Diligence and Integrity in the Service of the Nation (NoR) ceremony.

Event Information
When: 1 December 2025, at 10:30
Where: Stora sessionssalen, Alnarp

Hip hip hooray for a well-deserved nomination!
